services.title: Service 1
services.description:
I will draw a small portrait (yes I do pet portraits as well!)
OR any design of your choice rendered in pencil, fully shaded. Dimensions range from 5"x7" to
11"x14". Background elements = extra charge. Larger sizes must be discussed.

services.title: Service 2
services.description:
I will create a small colored pencil portrait (yes I do pet
portraits as well)! OR any design of your choice. Dimensions
range from 5"x7" to 11"x14". Background elements = extra charge. Larger sizes must be discussed.

services.title: Service 3
services.description:
I will create a small watercolor/gouache portrait (yes I do pet
portraits as well!) OR any design of your choice. Dimensions
range from 5"x7" to 11"x14". Background elements = extra charge. Larger sizes must be discussed.

services.title: Service 4
services.description:
I will do small to large scale paintings periodically. Message
me or email @SkyleeLPerkins@gmail.com to inquire about price,
duration, and subject matter.
